North_Miami.Jade Beach and Jade Ocean: Jade Beach and Jade Ocean are two high-rise residential condominiums located in Sunny Isles Beach, Florida. Finished in 2009, Jade Beach has 52 floors and rises 167 metres (549 ft), making it the second-tallest building in Sunny Isles Beach and the 18th tallest building in Florida as of early 2015. Jade Ocean has a darker colored, glass facaded, 546 feet (166 m), 51 story twin tower named Jade Ocean which was completed in 2008.
